blog about

talk at AI expo

October 20, 2019 — 14:11

Last month I was invited to give a talk at the AI Expo at Skylab, DTU’s lovely space for student innovation and entrepreneurship. I gave a quick overview over the field of Algorithmic Fairness and spoke a bit about my own research. The slides can be found here.

200+ people showed up and asked a lot of smart questions after my talk. Thanks!
